Dragon Breath.name: Dragon Breath
Dragon Breath.sourceRef: Player's Handbook, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms
Dragon Breath.fullText:
Dragonborn Racial PowerDragon Breath

As you open your mouth with a roar, the deadly power of your draconic kin blasts forth to engulf your foes.

Encounter        Varies
Minor Action      Close blast 3

Target: Each creature in the blast

Attack: Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity vs. Reflex. You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
    Level 11: The bonus increases to +4.
    Level 21: The bonus increases to +6.

Hit: 1d6 + Constitution modifier damage.
    Level 11: 2d6 + Constitution modifier damage.
    Level 21: 3d6 + Constitution modifier damage.

Special: When you create your character, choose Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity as the ability score you use when making attack rolls with this power. You also choose the power’s damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. These two choices remain throughout your character’s life and do not change the power’s other effects.


Update (11/16/2010)
Updated to match Essentials data.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 34, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 240.
Dragon Breath.flavor: As you open your mouth with a roar, the deadly power of your draconic kin blasts forth to engulf your foes.
Dragon Breath.attack:
Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity vs. Reflex. You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
    Level 11: The bonus increases to +4.
    Level 21: The bonus increases to +6.
Dragon Breath.onHit:
1d6 + Constitution modifier damage.
    Level 11: 2d6 + Constitution modifier damage.
    Level 21: 3d6 + Constitution modifier damage.
Dragon Breath.special: When you create your character, choose Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity as the ability score you use when making attack rolls with this power. You also choose the power’s damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. These two choices remain throughout your character’s life and do not change the power’s other effects.

Dragonfear.name: Dragonfear
Dragonfear.fullText:
Dragonborn Racial PowerDragonfear

Your presence causes your enemies to quake and tremble.

Encounter      Fear
Minor Action      Close burst 5 (increase to close burst 10 at 21st level)

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Strength +2 vs. Will or Charisma +2 vs. Will
Level 11: Strength + 4 vs. Will or Charisma + 4 vs. Will.
Level 21: Strength + 6 vs. Will or Charisma + 6 vs. Will.

Hit: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 388.
Dragonfear.flavor: Your presence causes your enemies to quake and tremble.
Dragonfear.range: Close burst 5 (increase to close burst 10 at 21st level)<
Dragonfear.attack:
Strength +2 vs. Will or Charisma +2 vs. Will
Level 11: Strength + 4 vs. Will or Charisma + 4 vs. Will.
Level 21: Strength + 6 vs. Will or Charisma + 6 vs. Will.
Dragonfear.onHit: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Dragon’s Dive.name: Dragon’s Dive
Dragon’s Dive.fullText:
Dragonborn Racial Utility 6Dragon’s Dive

You set your sights on your foe and dive through the fray, heedless of the threats of others.

Encounter
No Action      Personal

Trigger: You charge an enemy.

Effect: Your movement made as part of the charge does not provoke opportunity attacks.


Published in Dragon Magazine 408.
Dragon’s Dive.flavor: You set your sights on your foe and dive through the fray, heedless of the threats of others.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You charge an enemy.

Effect: Your movement made as part of the charge does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Dragon’s Dive.effect: Your movement made as part of the charge does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Baleful Glance.name: Baleful Glance
Baleful Glance.fullText:
Dragonborn Racial Utility 2Baleful Glance

You single out an enemy, holding the foe’s gaze with your menacing stare.

Encounter      Fear
Free Action      Close burst 5 (increases to close burst 10 at 21st level)

Target: One enemy you can see in the burst that is affected by your dragonfear

Effect: The target is dazed (save ends).


Update (4/18/2012)
Updated in March 2012.

Published in Dragon Magazine 408.
Baleful Glance.flavor: You single out an enemy, holding the foe’s gaze with your menacing stare.
Baleful Glance.range: Close burst 5 (increases to close burst 10 at 21st level)<
Baleful Glance.target: One enemy you can see in the burst that is affected by your dragonfear

Arkhosian Resilience.name: Arkhosian Resilience
Arkhosian Resilience.fullText:
Dragonborn Racial Utility 10Arkhosian Resilience

You call forth the elemental forces that power your breath weapon to shield you from harm.

Daily
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: You take damage of a type that matches the damage type you chose for your dragon breath power.

Effect: You gain resistance equal to 5 + one-half your level to the triggering damage type until the end of the encounter.


Published in Dragon Magazine 408.
Arkhosian Resilience.flavor: You call forth the elemental forces that power your breath weapon to shield you from harm.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You take damage of a type that matches the damage type you chose for your dragon breath power.

Effect: You gain resistance equal to 5 + one-half your level to the triggering damage type until the end of the encounter.

Triumphant Roar.name: Triumphant Roar
Triumphant Roar.fullText:
Dragonborn Racial Utility 16Triumphant Roar

Your success gives you such enthusiasm that you loose a roar that strikes fear into all the foes around you.

Encounter
Free Action      Personal

Trigger: You bloody an enemy with an attack or reduce a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points with an attack.

Effect: You use dragonfear even if it is already expended.


Published in Dragon Magazine 408.
